title: The One Night Stand Next Door
description: Look, I didn't go out of my way to sleep with my next-door neighbor.It just happened.On the counter. Over the counter. Probably under it, too, if we hadn't moved it to the bedroom.But take it from me: a one night stand with your neighbor?It's not all it's cracked up to be...The One Night Stand Next Door is a short, flirty, and dirty prequel to The Girl Next Door. You don't have to read it before you dive in to The Girl Next Door, but why wouldn't you?
author: Emma Hart
